product_name: Columbia Arcadia II Rain Jacket - Women's
long_description: Simplicity and clean lines keep the waterproof, breathable Columbia Arcadia II Rain Jacket for women your everyday choice for rainy days around town or in camp. Omni-Tech(TM) shell is fully seam sealed, and is windproof and waterproof. Storm hood and hem are adjustable to seal out bad weather. Partially recycled polyester mesh lining adds comfort. Zippered hand pockets secure essentials. Columbia Arcadia II Rain Jacket stuffs into its own zippered pocket for easy stowing.
short_description: Simplicity and clean lines keep the waterproof, breathable Columbia Arcadia II Rain Jacket for women your everyday choice for rainy days around town or in camp.
